scripts.add-plugins: ionic cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-whitelist cordova-plugin-statusbar cordova-plugin-device cordova-plugin-splashscreen ionic-plugin-keyboard cordova-plugin-x-socialsharing cordova-plugin-app-event cordova-plugin-camera cordova-plugin-compat  cordova-plugin-email cordova-plugin-facebook4 cordova-plugin-file cordova-plugin-inappbrowser cordova-plugin-media cordova-plugin-network-information cordova-sqlite-storage de.appplant.cordova.plugin.local-notification es6-promise-plugin
scripts.remove-plugins: ionic cordova plugin rm cordova-plugin-whitelist cordova-plugin-statusbar cordova-plugin-device cordova-plugin-splashscreen ionic-plugin-keyboard cordova-plugin-x-socialsharing cordova-plugin-app-event cordova-plugin-camera cordova-plugin-compat  cordova-plugin-email cordova-plugin-facebook4 cordova-plugin-file cordova-plugin-inappbrowser cordova-plugin-media cordova-plugin-network-information cordova-sqlite-storage de.appplant.cordova.plugin.local-notification es6-promise-plugin
scripts.plugins: npm run remove-plugins && npm run add-plugins
scripts.ios: ionic cordova platform add ios && ionic cordova build ios && ionic cordova prepare ios
scripts.android: ionic cordova platform add android && ionic cordova build android && ionic cordova prepare android
scripts.clean-ios: ionic cordova platform rm ios && npm run plugins && npm run ios
scripts.clean-android: ionic cordova platform rm android && npm run plugins && npm run android
scripts.update-platform: ionic cordova platform rm ios  && ionic cordova platform rm android && ionic cordova platform add ios  && ionic cordova platform add android
scripts.fresh: npm run initialize && npm run ios && npm run android
scripts.update: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && npm run clean-ios && npm run clean-android

cordova-plugin-camera.PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: This app requires access to the photo library.
